div.p: This page contains a list of JIRA tickets that have been implemented in this release. As well as the following new features:
This was a regularly scheduled release with several major improvments to THO's functionality.

ol.li: Placed all external terminology content under one section of THO "External Content".
Replaced code system resources for metadata records with HTML pages
Made accessing information on external code systems simpler by having it all accessible from a single page, and having the URI and/or OID accessible directly on that page.
Added the capability to filter HL7 Code Systems, Value Sets, and External Identifier Systems. Filtering External Code Systems will occur in a later release

div.p: The following JIRA tickets in the UP JIRA project have been implemented:

tr.td: Request to deprecate the concept PHDSCSOPT in the HL7 THO coding System
Rename v2 table 0003 to disambiguate from table 0450
Add new UMB code to v2-0203
Update USEncounterDischarge Disposition for US Core
Remove "Specializes" and "Generalizes" properties from v3 code systems
Add transmitter concept to provenance participant type
Create an ISO-8601 Derived Periods Code System
Remove duplicate terms in artifact-relationship-type valueSet
Add a new Coverage Detail code system to THO
Provide guidance for accessing the codes
Change the ResearchSubjectMilestone ValueSet to use NCIT
Change UK spellings to US for service-category codes
Create a Study Design value set from Scientific Evidence Code System (SEVCO)
Create THO Value Set for FHIR Immunization.performer.function
Add Group Code code system to THO
Retire of EvidenceVariableRole ValueSet and CodeSystem from THO
SOPT - Additional Identifier and Other Changes
add additional format codes for IPS
Additional concepts for the HL7 Workgroup code system
Clarify ICD-9 Identifiers on "Using ICD with HL7 Standards" Page
Add FEvIR Object Identifier (FOI) Identifier System per TSMG
Overhaul External Code System Representation in THO
Make explicit that IRI identifiers are not intended to be used in Identifier.system or Coding.system

div.p: This was a regularly scheduled release with no significant changes to the structure of THO.
The following JIRA tickets in the UP JIRA project have been implemented:

tr.td: Create CodeSystem and ValueSet to replace Ex-ProcedureType
Create CodeSystem and ValueSet to indicate Medical Management Types
Create CodeSystem and ValueSet to replace Ex-DiagnosisType
Update Network Type Codes CodeSystem to incorporate the code negotiated
Move three DeviceAlert related CodeSystems and their attendant ValueSets from FHIR core to THO
Add payment related identifier types to CodeSystem v2-0203
Change to OHDSI Standardized Vocabularies HTA record Publisher metadata

div.p: This was an interim release to address issues needed for US Core, C-CDA, and FHIR Clinical Documents publications.
The following JIRA tickets in the UP JIRA project have been implemented:

tr.td: Update MDC CodeSystem with copyright statement
All codes value set for USPS code system
Add all codes value set for CMS POS code system
Add USPS State Codes per TSMG
Add National Association of Insurance Commissioners (NAIC) Company Codes Identifier System per TSMG

ol.li: Added a Changes page to start tracking changes within the IG.

div.p: The following JIRA tickets in the UP JIRA project have been implemented:

tr.td: add identifier type for "Kassensitz-IK" to identifier type (table 0203)
add codes to v2-0203 for use in German profiles
Merge and migrate US Core and C-CDA discharge disposition value sets to THO
Update v3 DocumentFormatCodes to align with C-CDA versions in use
Add topic and jurisdiction codes to
MeasureSupplementalData code system and value set should be active
Move terminologies from FHIR to THO for EBMonFHIR Resources
Create a new combined CodeSystem within THO that will support the replacement of Composition.relatesTo when RelatedArtifact datatype is deprecated
The narrative definition of the code "complete" is not consistent with the usage in immunizationRecommendation.
Create a THO Valueset for Y/N/NA/UNK
Add Links to Versioning Policy and Release Notes
Create a US Realm language value set
Add Scientific Evidence Code System (SEVCO) per TSMG
Add URIs for V2 Tables Code Systems and Value Sets
Add Temporary uri for ICH Context of Use
Add Vaccine Information Statements per TSMG
Add ICH Context of Use per TSMG
Add UniProt Identifier System per TSMG
Create a convenience copy of the CMS POS code system
